query:
-- Remove fake users from collaborators (trip id 1)
DELETE FROM trip_collaborators WHERE userId IN (
  SELECT id FROM users WHERE openId LIKE 'test-%'
);

-- Add real Michal (assuming her real user id is the latest one with that email)
INSERT INTO trip_collaborators (tripId, userId, permission, addedAt)
SELECT 1, id, 'view_only', NOW()
FROM users 
WHERE email = 'mikgrn@gmail.com' 
  AND openId NOT LIKE 'test-%'
LIMIT 1;
